title: How to use `scriptResume`
text: function read currently active R script summarize script following information current computing enviroment, hence name package scriptResume. Files imported funcitons read*(), load(), source() collected Files exported functions write*(), save*() collected. Since function targeted pharma industry, automatically read current working directory ant output triplet information. illustration tested local function shown output.
code: # ****************************************************************************** # Property of company # Program name     : scriptResume.R # Description      : # Author           : author # Compound number  : SAR # Study code       : # Analysis code    : BMK- # Date created     : 2023-05-16 # Input files      : data/file1.csv, #                    data/file2.Rds, #                    data/file3.Rda # Input programs   : src/preprocess.R # Packages needed  : abc, #                    knitr, #                    lib, #                    rmarkdown, #                    xyz # Outputs created  : data/file2.csv, #                    data/file3.Rds # R version        : R version 4.1.0 (2021-05-18) # Platform         : Linux-4.4.0-19041-Microsoft # ****************************************************************************** # Modification status : # In progress | 2023-05-16 | author # Description: # ****************************************************************************** data1 <- read.csv("data/file1.csv") data2 <- readRDS("data/file2.Rds") load("data/file3.Rda") source("src/preprocess.R") write.csv(data2, "data/file2.csv") saveRDS(file3, "data/file3.Rds")
